title: Gypsy
description: Scarlett Cole, unsuspecting Gypsy working her job reading tea cups and tarot cards. Enter one Mason Archillies... Thick Russian accent claiming she is more that she is. Uncertain why his sudden interest in her, Scarlett finds herself in the control of a dark and dangerous man, who's lust and disgust is aimed solely on her... Warning: This book contains material of sex and submission and violence. It is recommended for a mature audience.
author: E.L. Beth
